attributes.action: Strip Lynton Crosby of his knighthood.
attributes.additional_details:
Lynton Crosby is not British.
Lynton Crosby is a political mercenary
Lynton Crosby and his connections to the tabacco industry
attributes.background: If there are to be people honored by this country it should be for services that benefit the country as a whole. Not, as in this case, for someone who benefited a political party.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
